semantics.label: translate:: Description
semantics.description: translate:: Description of the export page.
semantics.default: translate:: On this page you can choose to export your text, goals and goals assessments.

semantics.label: translate:: Create document button label
semantics.description: translate:: Text that will be displayed on the "Create document"-button.

semantics.label: translate:: Submit text button
semantics.description: translate:: Text that will be displayed on the "Submit"-button.

semantics.label: translate:: Submit success label
semantics.default: translate:: Your report was submitted successfully!

semantics.label: translate:: Select all exportable text button label
semantics.description: translate:: Text that will be displayed on the "Select all text"-button.

semantics.label: translate:: Export text button label
semantics.description: translate:: Text that will be displayed on the "Export text"-button.

semantics.label: translate:: Label for help text
semantics.description: translate:: Label for showing additional helpful information to the user.

semantics.label: translate:: Fill in additional help information
semantics.description: translate:: Here you can fill in additional helpful information for the user.

semantics.label: translate:: Required input missing text
semantics.description: translate:: An error message which will be displayed if one or more required input fields have not been filled. @pages will be replaced with the titles of affected pages.
semantics.default: translate:: The following pages contain required fields that need to be filled in order to review or submit this document: @pages
